data.title: Siemens’ Push Into AI Extends to CEO’s Workout Routine
data.description: Siemens AG’s Chief Executive Officer Roland Busch is working hard to pivot the German industrial company to expand into artificial intelligence applications. He’s also using the technology to share sports tips.
data.keywords: SIEMENS AG-REG,Artificial Intelligence,Chief Executive Officer,Roland Busch,ALPHABET INC-CL A,Germany,Sports,Valuation,Software,Automation,industries
